About Me


Hi, I am Hanqing Wang - a Ph D candidate of Media Computing and Intelligent Systems Lab, Beijing Institute of Technology - Beijing. I am now advised by Professor Wei Liang and Professor Mingtao Pei. We also cooperate with Professor Lap-Fai(Carig) Yu - director of Design Computing and Extended Reality Group, George Mason University - Virginia.

My research interests are Computer Vision/Graphics and Deep Learning.
